sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(true); const menuItems = [ { id: 'overview', label: '📊 Overview', icon: '📊' }, { id: 'profile', label: '👤 Profile', icon: '👤' }, { id: 'attendance', label: '⏰ Attendance', icon: '⏰' }, { id: 'leave', label: '🏖️ Leave Management', icon: '🏖️' }, { id: 'payroll', label: '💰 Payroll', icon: '💰' }, { id: 'performance', label: '📈 Performance', icon: '📈' }, ...(user?.role === 'admin' ? [ { id: 'employees', label: '👥 Employee Management', icon: '👥' }, { id: 'reports', label: '📋 Reports', icon: '📋' } ] : []) ]; const renderContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'overview': return ; case 'profile': return ; case 'attendance': return ; case 'leave': return ; case 'payroll': return ; case 'performance': return ; case 'employees': return ; case 'reports': return ; default: return ; } }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}

🚀 HRMS

{menuItems.map(item => ( ))}
{user?.first_name?.charAt(0)}{user?.last_name?.charAt(0)}
{sidebarOpen && (

{user?.first_name} {user?.last_name}

{user?.role}

)}
{/* Main Content */}

{menuItems.find(item => item.id === activeTab)?.label}

{new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}
{renderContent()}
); }; // Tab Components const OverviewTab = ({ user }) => (
